blog.title: Blog

landing.title: Tragos Locos
landing.slogan: Liven up your party, unleash the fun!
landing.description: Tired of the same old party games? Looking to spice up your social gatherings? Look no further! Tragos locos is designed to take your parties to new heights.

question_counts.title: We have a lot of questions
question_counts.description: So you can play again and again with new and fun questions.

steeps.title: How it works?
steeps.description: Follow these simple steps to start playing and take your social gatherings to the next level.

step_1.title: Download the app
step_1.description: Get it from your favorite store or as a PWA.

step_2.title: Open it
step_2.description: Start the app on your device.

step_4.title: Select the game mode
step_4.description: Choose between the different modes available.

share_fun.title: Show us your fun!
share_fun.description: Are you enjoying the app? We want to see it! Send us your photos and share your best moments with the community. Be part of our story!
share_fun.footer: Share your most epic moments with us and be part of the community. We're waiting for your photos! 📸

landingPage.features_subtitle: Discover everything you can do with Tragos Locos
landingPage.feature1_desc: Fun and dynamic games that will keep everyone entertained for hours
landingPage.feature2_desc: Ideal for small and large parties, with special team modes
landingPage.feature3_desc: Intuitive interface that lets you start playing in seconds
landingPage.download_title: Download Tragos Locos and start the party!

landingPage.step1_desc: Enter the names of the players.
landingPage.step2_desc: Choose the game mode that suits you best or you feel like playing.
landingPage.step3_desc: Answer cards, complete challenges and drink according to the rules.
